match.title: 1st Match
match.statusText: Sri Lanka won by 9 wickets (with 116 balls remaining)

series.description: Bangladesh, India, Pakistan, Sri Lanka in Bangladesh

image.caption: Black clouds hang over the Bangabandhu national stadium in Dhaka
image.longCaption: Black clouds hang over Banghabandhu nation stadium in Dhaka as the pitch is covered with plastic 20 April 2003. South African and India are to play the final match of the TVS tri-nation cricket tournament, but heavy rain stopped the match before it could start

notes: Aravinda de Silva 50 in 57 balls, 85 mins

stories.title: De Silva dazzles in Asia Cup opener
stories.summary:
After three days of performing the role of a weather reporter
at Dhaka, scribes finally had a chance to do what they had come
here for

stories.title: Asia Cup: Bangladesh v Sri Lanka,Statistical Highlights
stories.summary: It was the 1596th ODI in cricket history

recentReportStory.title: De Silva dazzles in Asia Cup opener
recentReportStory.summary:
After three days of performing the role of a weather reporter
at Dhaka, scribes finally had a chance to do what they had come
here for
